name: Curie
description:
Curie is the first game that I have made and Ludum Dare 46 is the first game jam that I have ever joined. With only a two-week experience, I'm kind of proud of what I made, though I could do better.

Curie is a Multi-directional Shooter with your character being a radioactive atom on the verge of exploding. You will need to shoot enemy atoms as you maintain your Radiation Level by emitting small amounts of radiation.
